actions.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Brown-Waite, Ginny.
On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment adds to the water research outcomes a study of water-intensive sectors of the economy and industrial needs for water.
purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-82 to require agencies included in the interagency committee to work on improvement of understanding of water-intensive sectors of the economy and industrial needs for water.
